text:
We will be using Edfinity for Calculus 1 - Fall 2025. To enroll, please follow the steps below:

1. If you already have an Edfinity account from a previous course, please sign into it. Otherwise, go to step 2.
2. Go to the following registration link: https://edfinity.com/join/H7C84FUR
3. You will be prompted to pay (if applicable) and enroll in our course (Calculus 1 - Fall 2025).
4. Start working on your assignments!

Note: If you are creating a new Edfinity account, please use the same name and UAA email as in Blackboard to avoid issues when importing/exporting scores.
